medical_history.chief_complaint: Severe head injury after a motorcycle accident.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient was admitted after multiple traumas from a motorcycle accident. Two years earlier, he was diagnosed with arrhythmogenic right ventricular dysplasia (ARVD) following family screening after his father's sudden cardiac death. The patient was asymptomatic at the time of diagnosis. After the accident, he showed severe closed head injury with a Glasgow Coma Scale score of 3.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Arrhythmogenic right ventricular dysplasia (ARVD) diagnosed two years prior.
medical_history.family_history: Father died suddenly at age 39, related to ARVD.
